overview_of_class: Among the literary masterpieces of the past 100 years are the short stories of American writers such as Ernest Hemingway, Flannery O'Connor, Eudora Welty, and Raymond Carver. We will explore style and theme in the works of these and other short story writers. We will also examine the influences that these writers had on each other and on the development of the short story in general. Class will be conducted primarily by group discussion with the instructor giving brief lectures to provide background on the authors.
name: Studies in American Literature:
subject: ENGLISH
